attributes.action: make Joseph Richmond-Seaton a lord of the realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joseph Richmond-Seaton deserves a seat in the House of Lords for years of service to himself. Without a pin prick of doubt he has done more for himself than anybody in the United Kingdom and we the undersigned entreat your power to recognise these facts and honour them appropriately.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
